title: SSH tab activity signaling
author: anvibo
body_snippet:
It would be nice to have a way to signal that an activity has occurred on an SSH tab that is having the focus

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36622588/41918014-1e275232-7964-11e8-89a7-fac971b115ff.png)

iterations.description: Current implementation lacks a mechanism to visually signal (e.g., flash tab) when activity occurs in a background SSH session; only title synchronization is present.

comments.author: stufently
comments.snippet: Have same problem in windows 10 and remoteng 1.76.4 Alpha 6 (2018-06-03):

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Current implementation lacks a mechanism to visually signal (e.g., flash tab) when activity occurs in a background SSH session; only title synchronization is present.
Approach: Hook into PuTTY window messages or monitor title changes to trigger a visual alert (color change/flash) on the parent tab.
